subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Syracuse, which had lost five of its last seven games entering the N.C.A.A. tournament, ran out to a 15-4 lead and had no trouble with Western Michigan the rest of the way.
snippet: Syracuse, which had lost five of its last seven games entering the N.C.A.A. tournament, ran out to a 15-4 lead and had no trouble with Western Michigan the rest of the way.
